attributes.action: Legislate to prevent Vulture Funds profiting from Third World Debt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A "Vulture Fund" is a company that buys up the debt of poor nations cheaply when it is about to be written off, then sues for the full value of the debt plus interest. 

The example whereby the British Virgin Islands-based Donegal International paid less than $4m for a debt owed by Zambia, but sued Zambia for a $42m repayment, is an example of profiteering that should not be allowed in UK law.

Legislation must be introduced to prevent Vulture Funds using UK Courts to profiteer at the expense of Third World Countries that are struggling financially.
